description: Nickey takes the last room in town - she doesn't care. The rain is dumping and this po-dunk shit town is for some reason booked solid. The only room left is a scary dive next to the quickie mart. Who cares! Or at least that is how she feels until she gets into the creepy old room. The bed creaks, the room smells and noises come from every knick-knack and painting in the room. Nickey is scared out of her wits which means Tiffany's plan has worked. By the time Tiffany swoops in to console the scared little bird, she can make Nickey do just about anything she wants! Tiffany's thick cock bulges out and takes Nickey by total surprise but that doesn't last - Tiffany uses Nickey's mouth and pussy to milk a nice load out of her cock.
title: "Haunted" Hotel - TS Tiffany Star fucks the Spooked Guest!
